name: MTKMeshBuffer
desc: A buffer that backs the vertex data of a Model I/O mesh, suitable for use in a Metal app.

items.name: allocator
items.desc: The allocator object used to create this mesh buffer.

items.name: type
items.desc: The type of data contained in the originating Model I/O buffer.

items.name: buffer
items.desc: The Metal buffer backing all vertex and index data.

items.name: length
items.desc: The logical size of the Metal buffer, in bytes.

items.name: offset
items.desc: The byte offset of the data within the Metal buffer.
